intro.heading: The perfect place for your business events
paragraphs: Hotel Beograd offers a modernly equipped conference hall with a capacity of up to 60 people, perfect for various types of events. The hall is designed to meet a wide range of needs â€“ from business meetings and seminars to trainings, presentations, and press conferences.

It is equipped with the latest audio and video technology, ensuring the smooth running of any event. Our professional team provides full support in event organization, ensuring everything goes flawlessly and professionally.

During breaks, we provide food and beverage service, tailored to the preferences and needs of your guests. The prices for using the hall are connected to other hotel services, and if the event is directly related to the accommodation of participants, the hall can be used at no additional cost.

characteristics.heading: DVD Player
characteristics.p: The room is equipped with a DVD player for playing video content, ideal for presentations and training sessions.

characteristics.heading: Conference Hall  - Hotel Beograd
characteristics.p: Hotel Beograd offers a modern conference room with a capacity of up to 60 people, perfect for conferences, seminars, business meetings, and other professional events. It is equipped for presentations and trainings, ready to connect with a projector and other equipment.

characteristics.heading: LCD TV
characteristics.p: The room is equipped with an LCD TV, suitable for displaying presentations, video content, and video conferences.

characteristics.heading: Sound System
characteristics.p: The sound system provides clear and high-quality sound, tailored to the needs of all events, from presentations to conferences.

characteristics.heading: Projector
characteristics.p: The projector allows high-quality image and video content display, ideal for presentations and seminars.

characteristics.heading: WiFi
characteristics.p: Fast WiFi connection ensures smooth work, access to online content, and the ability to hold video conferences.
